How Trace'N Find Works

A simple, powerful, and secure process to keep your devices safe. Get protected in just a few minutes.

Simple Setup

Protected in 4 Easy Steps

Getting started with Trace'N Find is simple. Follow these easy steps to secure your devices.

1

Install & Sign Up

Create your free Trace'N Find account here on the website. Then, download and install the companion app onto your Android or Windows device.

2

Add Your Device

Log in to your web dashboard and click "Add Device". You can scan a QR code from your mobile app for instant, secure pairing.

3

Track & Manage

You're all set! View your device's live location, battery status, and location history from your dashboard, anywhere in the world.

4

Secure When Lost

If your device is lost or stolen, use the "Security" panel to instantly ring, lock, or wipe your device to protect your personal data.

Questions?

Frequently Asked Questions

Find answers to common questions about Trace'N Find.

Is Trace'N Find free to use?

Yes, as a Final Year Project for GMI, Trace'N Find is completely free to use. There are no fees or subscriptions.

What devices are supported?

Currently, our companion app supports **Android** devices (phones, tablets) and **Windows** computers (laptops, desktops). Support for iOS and macOS is planned for the future.

How is my data secured?

We use Firebase's advanced security rules. Your personal data (like device locations) is stored in a private path in the database that is only readable and writable by you. No other user, not even an admin, can see your location data.

What happens if my device is offline or turned off?

If a device is offline, you will not be able to track it in real-time or send live commands (like Ring, Lock, or Wipe). However, your dashboard will show you its **last known location** before it went offline. Commands like "Lock" or "Wipe" will be queued and will execute the moment the device reconnects to the internet.

Get Peace of Mind Today

Stop worrying about your devices. Get started with Trace'N Find for free and experience true security.
